summary: Root of the monorepo for the 'Clash' project - a multi-agent creative platform combining a Next.js frontend, Python FastAPI backend, and Cloudflare Workers.
context_hints: Start here for high-level architecture understanding
Look here for global build scripts (Makefile, package.json)
Check apps/ for specific application logic

subdirectories.apps: Contains the main runnable applications: 'web' (Frontend), 'api' (Python Agent Backend), 'loro-sync-server' (Real-time Sync), 'auth-gateway' (Auth).
subdirectories.packages: Shared libraries and packages used across the apps, including 'shared-types' (Protocol definitions) and 'remotion-*' (Video generation).
subdirectories.docs: Project-wide documentation, architecture guides, and specs.
subdirectories.scripts: Utility scripts for setup, deployment, and maintenance.
subdirectories.data: Local development databases and persistent storage.

key_files.Makefile: The central command runner. Use this to start dev servers, build projects, and run tests. (e.g., 'make dev-full')
key_files.pnpm-workspace.yaml: Defines the monorepo workspace structure for Node.js packages.
key_files.turbo.json: Configuration for TurboRepo task runner pipeline.
key_files.AGENTS.md: High-level guide for AI Agents regarding shared configuration and model patterns.

architecture_notes: Monorepo structure managed by pnpm and turbo. Uses a 'Gateway' pattern for architecture.
